column4: Can someone tell me what nvidia drivers i should get for my new nvidia card? uname -r gives me 2.6.12-9-386   So i should grab the linux-restricted-modules-2.6.12-9-386 right ???
if I understand you >>dia<< is the program you want
install apache2 if that is what you want
you can script gimp to do the work - never done it myself
